AppearanceUI, ArenaEndGameUI, ArenaPreGameUI, ArenaQueuedUI, AttachmentsUI, CareerUI, EquipmentUI, GadgetsUI, InventoryUI, LoadoutUI, PauseUI, PerksUI, PlayUI, RoomsUI, SettingsUI, ShopUI
public abstract class OverlayMenu extends UIScreen
UIScreen with a darkener and title text.
